Topic.Title: Uploading of INFORM files still possible?

Posts.EditableText:
Is the functionality of uploading INFORM files (z5, z8, gblorb files) still working?

I just tried with a test gblorb file from INFORM 7 and it gets an error every time. It's possible that it's the file to blame, but I wanted to ask in case this functionality was no longer working.

Does anyone have any thoughts?

-Hubble
